Only Tribewanted members are allowed access to the island.  It is now free to join the Tribe website, with the right to stay on the island starting at Â£200 for seven days.

Once permission is secured, arriving at the island involves a domestic flight from capital

a member of the Tribewanted team will meet you at the airport and then it's a 40-minute boat transfer to the island.

Tribewanted is a unique cross-cultural community tourism project.
Build. Sleep. Swim. Trek. Dance. Fish. Snorkel. Read. Play. Teach. Sing. Farm. Blog. Cook. Pretty much anything really.
All meals are communal and included in the membership price.  Most food is sourced locally.
and beer are available at an extra cost.
